005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.HashSet;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Set;
024import java.util.stream.Collectors;
025import java.util.stream.IntStream;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029public final class ArrayRemove {
030  @NonNull
031  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
032      .name("remove")
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextIndependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("array")
039          .type(IArrayItem.class)
040          .one()
041          .build())
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("positions")
044          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
045          .zeroOrMore()
046          .build())
047      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
048      .returnOne()
049      .functionHandler(ArrayRemove::execute)
050      .build();
051
052  private ArrayRemove() {
053    // disable construction
054  }
055
056  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
057  @NonNull
058  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
059      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
060      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
061      IItem focus) {
062    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
063        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
064    ISequence<? extends IIntegerItem> positions = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
065
066    return ISequence.of(removeItems(array, positions));
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
071   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>.
072   *
073   * @param <T>
074   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
075   * @param array
076   *          the target Metapath array
077   * @param positions
078   *          the integer position of the items to remove
079   * @return a new array containing the modification
080   * @throws ArrayException
081   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
082   */
083  @NonNull
084  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> removeItems(
085      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
086      @NonNull Collection<? extends IIntegerItem> positions) {
087    return remove(
088        array,
089        ObjectUtils.notNull(positions.stream()
090            .map(position -> position.asInteger().intValueExact())
091            .collect(Collectors.toSet())));
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
096   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>.
097   *
098   * @param <T>
099   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
100   * @param array
101   *          the target Metapath array
102   * @param positions
103   *          the integer position of the items to remove
104   * @return a new array containing the modification
105   * @throws ArrayException
106   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
107   */
108  @NonNull
109  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> remove(
110      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
111      @NonNull Collection<Integer> positions) {
112    Set<Integer> positionSet = positions instanceof Set ? (Set<Integer>) positions : new HashSet<>(positions);
113
114    List<T> remaining = ObjectUtils.notNull(IntStream.range(1, array.size() + 1)
115        .filter(index -> !positionSet.contains(index))
116        .mapToObj(index -> array.get(index - 1))
117        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
118
119    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(remaining);
120  }
121}
